extension.description: Generates Video Playlists. Specialized for diverse video collections, including non-standard media. Features include: - Folder and file scanning with various filtering options. - Advanced sorting (alphabetical, newest, custom). - Set management for reusable playlist configurations. - AI-powered filename cleaning, content grouping, and metadata enhancement (requires NLTK data download). - Context menu integration for direct playlist generation and stream saving/downloading. - Customizable playlist output with metadata and color tags.
extension.news:
[3.0.4a] - Critical fix: Add-on now launches correctly without crashing. - Removed background service. Add-on now runs on demand. [3.0.3a] - Improved stability: Add-on settings now correctly reset after creating playlists or editing set settings, preventing unexpected changes. - Enhanced settings management: Editing set-specific settings is now smoother, ensuring all settings load correctly and use smart defaults. - General refinements for a better user experience in set management and playlist creation.
[3.0.2] - **New possibilities with AI:** AI features now start faster and use fewer resources by loading smart tools only when you need them. - **Easier NLTK Data:** Simplified downloading of NLTK data (required for AI features) directly from add-on settings, ensuring it's always found. - Overall improvements to AI integration for smarter filename cleaning and content grouping.
